fact_check_explanation_title: Claims the Royal British Legion won’t sell poppies to avoid upsetting ‘minorities’ are false
fact_check_explanation_summary: This incorrect claim appears every year.

fact_check_explanation_title: People deciding not to get tested will not make it look as though coronavirus has been wiped out
fact_check_explanation_summary: Covid-19’s prevalence in the community is measured by more than the number of positive tests.

fact_check_explanation_title: Covid-19 kills far more than 0.1% of the people who catch it
fact_check_explanation_summary: The real death rate from Covid-19 is probably about five or ten times higher than 0.1%
With the issue of Covid-19 testing back in the news, we take a look at how the testing programme is currently performing.

fact_check_explanation_title: How many children are missing or trafficked in the UK?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Most missing children cases are resolved quickly and without harm recorded.

fact_check_explanation_title: Matt Hancock gets test and trace figures wrong again
The word “robot” comes from Czech, not Greek like GPT-3 claims
fact_check_explanation_summary: GPT-3 is mistaken about the etymology of the word robot.

fact_check_explanation_title: This data does not show tests for coronavirus being ordered pre-2020
fact_check_explanation_summary: Numerous items already used by the medical profession have been reclassified for use with Covid-19 in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic.

fact_check_explanation_title: Advice to clinically extremely vulnerable people varies by local lockdown area
fact_check_explanation_summary: Shielding for the clinically extremely vulnerable has been paused in the UK. That goes for most local lockdown areas, but not Leicester and Blackburn.

fact_check_explanation_title: What do we know about a ‘back to work’ campaign?
fact_check_explanation_summary: There has been confusion over whether the government had ever planned to launch a ‘back to work’ media campaign.

fact_check_explanation_title: These figures for non-Covid deaths aren’t accurate
Unlicensed vaccine manufacturers are immune from some, but not all, civil liability
fact_check_explanation_summary: A vaccine manufacturer would still be liable if their unlicensed product was defective.
